rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0001
rows.name:
Coming to this place always
calms me right down.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0002
rows.name:
I know what you mean.
It's so empty...in a good way.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0003
rows.name:
They've got a good salvaging
business going, but the place
isn't bustling like Avaritia.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0004
rows.name:
And they don't have a super-developed
primary sector like Gula.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0005
rows.name:
If you just want to live out your days
in peace, there's really no better place.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0006
rows.name: You talk like an old man sometimes.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0007
rows.name: What d'you think, Meleph?

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0008
rows.name: I would like to live here awhile.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0009
rows.name: Oh? Wasn't expecting that from you.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0010
rows.name:
Seeing such hospitality has been a
refreshing experience for me. It's lovely
to learn how the common folk live.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0011
rows.name: I quite agree.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0012
rows.name:
It's very different from staying
at a city inn.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0013
rows.name:
I guess you two are used to
the high life, huh...

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0014
rows.name: Are you so different yourself?

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0015
rows.name:
Since we left Luxuria, we've been
spending a lot of our nights
roughing it up outdoors, huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0016
rows.name: Sure have.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0017
rows.name:
It was pretty tough when we were
camping out waiting for you lot in
Invidia and Superbia.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0018
rows.name:
Always on our toes, thinking you might
show up any moment.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0019
rows.name:
Yeah, I don't miss those hungry
camping days. We came pretty
close to eating Kamekichi...

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0020
rows.name:
Let's not talk about that.
It's painful to remember.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0021
rows.name:
Waiting in the port here was
pretty all right, though.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0022
rows.name:
Yeah, we could rest up in
the ship, at least.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0023
rows.name:
...It sounds like you've
been through a lot.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0024
rows.name:
Stakeouts are one experience
I would rather avoid.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0025
rows.name: Anyway, that's enough about the past!

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0026
rows.name:
There was something I wanted
to ask you, Meleph.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0027
rows.name:
You've seen how smashing this
place is, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0028
rows.name:
I'm just worried that Superbia
and Invidia might wind up fighting
over it or something.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0029
rows.name: Not any time soon, I should hope.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0030
rows.name:
If either nation were to make a
move on these islands, it would be
tantamount to a declaration of war.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0031
rows.name:
Superbia, at least, has no
desire for such conflict.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0032
rows.name: Ah, right.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0033
rows.name: Well, that's pretty reassuring at least.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0034
rows.name:
Why are you so invested in the
fate of these islands, anyway?

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0035
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0036
rows.name: 'Cos it's where Rex grew up.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0037
rows.name: 'Cos there's no place like it in Alst.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0101
rows.name:
Ain't it natural to worry about
your friend's hometown?

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0102
rows.name: I suppose so.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0103
rows.name:
As long as this place is safe, our chum
can focus on the task he's gotta do.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0104
rows.name:
Don't want to let other worries start
creeping in to distract him, do I?

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0105
rows.name: Real thoughtful, that is.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0106
rows.name:
You said it! I'm the best!
Hahahah!

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0107
rows.name: ...And he just had to go and ruin it.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0201
rows.name: That's quite the grand statement.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0202
rows.name:
I reckon an environment like this
is the only place a chap like Rex
could grow up.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0204
rows.name:
Like, if a kid grows up in Alba Margen,
he's gonna want to join the army, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0205
rows.name:
Not saying that's bad or anything, but
I don't think a kid like that would wind
up as the Holy Grail's Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0206
rows.name:
Can't be easy raising the kind of
boy who could change the future
of Alst.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0207
rows.name:
All the world's nations and
establishments aren't gonna
foster that kind of potential.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0208
rows.name:
But this village? It's cut off from
all that. A place of freedom and
possibilities.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0209
rows.name: Ah, I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0210
rows.name:
Once in a while, you actually
say some princely stuff.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0211
rows.name: Oh, be quiet!

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0212
rows.name: I have to say, I agree with Zeke.

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0213
rows.name:
Villages like this have an important
place in Alst...

rows.label: kizunatalk034_msg0214
rows.name:
We must do our utmost to
keep them all from harm.
